title: Can anyone identify this font? "A statue has remembered me" Yorgos Sapountzis
content:
Hi

Can anyone help me identify this interesting font, which is used in Yorgos Sapountzis book; A statue has remembered me.

Notice the u and v. Beautiful!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130515233903im_/http:/typophile.com/files/yorgos_statue_motto_4_4955.jpg)
author: Nirfnarf

comments.content: i don't know if it will lead you in the right place, but [Vectis](http://web.archive.org/web/20130515233903/http:/www.fonts.com/font/greater-albion-typefounders/vectis/regular) has similar unevenness in characters. perhaps there's a sister font on the collection somewhere?
